Volunteer With Us! Join White Haven Football Club as a volunteer and make a positive impact in your community! This is a great opportunity to promote health, fitness, and community spirit while gaining experience and making new friends.
Discover Volunteer Opportunities for You! We rely on volunteers to assist with scrimmages, coach young players, organize events, coordinate logistics, and handle administrative tasks.
CONNECTNetwork with Your Community Members Meet like-minded individuals who share your passion for soccer and community service to make meaningful friendships and develop a sense of belonging within the community.
GAIN EXPERIENCEDevelop Your Skills in Event Management Improve your communication, leadership and teamwork capabilities that are valuable in many areas of life and work. Enhance your problem-solving abilities, as you learn to handle unexpected challenges.
MAKE A DIFFERENCESupport a great cause for Canadians Contribute to a non-for-profit organization dedicated to promoting community by helping us provide a positive and inclusive environment for players of all ages and skill levels.
ARE YOU INTERESTED?Join the movement shaping the future of soccer
TESTIMONIALSVoices From Our Community
Michael F. Charles "Joining this club has been a game-changer for me. There is an amazing community and top-notch coaching!"
Geoffrey Goodfellow "This club has brought out the best in my soccer skills and my confidence and it has been an incredible place to grow as a player and make lifelong friends."
Will Wong "A welcoming community and a supportive team atmosphere that truly fosters love for the game of soccer!"
